text: John Watson (c. 1914 - February 18, 1974) was a Canadian curler. He was the lead on the Billy Walsh rink that won the Brier Championship for Manitoba 1952. He was married to Alma and had a son, Jack. He died after a long illness in 1974"Curlers Lose Another", Winnipeg Free Press, Wednesday, February 20, 1974, Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada, pg. 53"WALSH UNBEATEN IN TITLE MARCH", Winnipeg Free Press, Saturday, March 08, 1952, Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada, pg. 24 ==References== Category:1910s births Category:1974 deaths Category:Curlers from Manitoba Category:Brier champions Category:Sportspeople from Winnipeg Category:Canadian male curlers
title: John Watson (curler)
